meanings.definition: Relating to the study of tissues and their functions.
meanings.sent1: The histophysiologic research focused on understanding how tissues work.
meanings.sent2: Scientists conducted histophysiologic experiments to learn about tissue functions.
meanings.sent3: The histophysiologic investigation into skin cells revealed surprising details.
meanings.sent4: Her histophysiologic approach to biology shed light on the inner workings of organs.
meanings.sent5: The histophysiologic analysis of muscle tissue was both fascinating and informative.

meanings.definition: Involving the physiological processes of tissues.
meanings.sent1: Understanding histophysiologic changes in cells is crucial for medical research.
meanings.sent2: The histophysiologic response of tissues to injury varies from person to person.
meanings.sent3: The histophysiologic reaction of the body to exercise can be quite remarkable.
meanings.sent4: His histophysiologic explanation of tissue repair was clear and concise.
meanings.sent5: The histophysiologic functions of different tissues play a vital role in overall health.
